name: humanizer (blader)
description: [项目级] Claude Code skill that removes signs of AI-generated writing from text。来源: https://github.com/blader/humanizer

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: Based on [Wikipedia's "Signs of AI writing"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Signs_of_AI_writing) guide, maintained by WikiProject AI Cleanup. This comprehensive guide comes from observations of thousands of instances of AI-generated text.
